array.name: sleep_breathrate_tips
array.item: 睡眠过程中呼吸率偏高，Keep the room temperature below 28 degrees, with enough oxygen, quiet and good indoor shading; use the comfortable pillow and bedding;keep a good mood.
睡眠过程中呼吸率正常。
睡眠过程中呼吸率偏低，Room temperature should not be too low, mild sound and weak light help you conform the surrounding environment more quickly after awake.

array.name: sleep_deepsleeptime_tips
array.item: Deep sleep time is not enough, you should bulid a considerable exercise plan, for example, 10000 steps walk per day, wont too tired but useful Drink a glass of milk before going to bed can help improving the quality of sleep.
Deep sleep time is enough ,the body and brain get a good rest,please keep on

Deep sleep time is too long, you should increase some daytime exercise and bulid a considerable exercise plan, for example, 10000 steps walk per day Reducing unnecessary sleep is very important so that you body can full of energy.

array.name: sleep_efficiency_tips
array.item: Poor sleep, please rest your whole body, don’t do anything else before you sleep, just lay on the bed and relax. Be nice to yourself! Don’;t have too much pressure, a healthy body is the key to slove all the problems
Normal sleep, don’t do anything else before you sleep. Calm down, good sleep helps you keep health both physical and mental.
Good sleep, this is conducive to physical and mental health and high efficiency in working, do maintain the good sleep habits.

array.name: sleep_heartrate_tips
array.item: 静息心率和白天平均心率相比高，Keep the room temperature below 28 degrees, with enough oxygen, quiet and good indoor shading; use the comfortable pillow and bedding;keep a good mood.
静息心率和白天平均心率相比相同，Keep the room temperature below 28 degrees, with enough oxygen, quiet and good indoor shading; use the comfortable pillow and bedding;keep a good mood.
Room temperature should not be too low, mild sound and weak light help you conform the surrounding environment more quickly after awake.

array.name: sleep_time_tips
array.item: Sleep time is not enough, you should ensure 6-8 hours sleeping time per day and please arrange a reasonable sleep plan, which contributes to physical and mental health and efficient working states.
Enough sleep, please maintain 6-8 hours a day of sleep habits.
Sleep time is too long, meet 6-8 hours of sleeping time, plus arrange the work and exercise reasonablely is helpful for the physical and mental health.

array.name: sleep_tosleeptime_tips
array.item: Sleep fast, which is helpful to maintain high quality sleep quality, please maintain a good sleepping habits.
Fall asleep in general, don’t do anything else before you sleep,sleep fast is helpful for the body recovery.
Difficult to fall asleep, don’t have too much pressure,don’t do anything else before you sleep, just relax and go get some sleep.
